Speaker: The SPEAKER
Title: Unknown
text: Mr Neil Andrew) took the chair at 9.30 a.m., and read prayers. NA

Speaker: Mr ABBOTT
Title: ADJOURNMENT
text: Given the importance of the prayer service that is about to begin, I move: That the House do now adjourn. Question agreed to.

Speaker: The SPEAKER
Title: ADJOURNMENT
text: As a mark of respect, the House stands adjourned until 12.30 p.m. on Monday, 11 November. House adjourned at 9.32 a.m.
